attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC is no longer the value for money it used to be and I certainly get angry paying for the 'celebrity' trash it farms out at present. As for claims of impartiality - those went out the window long ago as it has it become a law unto itself. I object to paying for both Sky and BBC when I hardly watch the BBC.

Scrap the licence fee. It should be subject to market forces like everything else.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
